hooks.prompt: IMPORTANT: NEVER block or stop continuation. Only provide a brief suggestion if ALL conditions are met: (1) the command was a dbt command like 'dbt run', 'dbt build', or 'dbt test', (2) it completed successfully, (3) you haven't suggested this before in this session. If conditions aren't met, output nothing. Never output anything for non-dbt commands like git, npm, python, etc.
